title: Investigate Cazador's Palace
content:
e and Gaseous Form abilities, as well as bonus 1-10 necrotic damage for his attacks. When you leave the area, the Gur Tribe, a group of monster hunters, will accost you. If you let Astarion finished the ritual, they will believe he is a monster and attack. If not, they will let you leave peacefully, and joins you as allies in quest Gather Your Allies.

How to unlock Investigate Cazador's Palace

You can acquire this quest from the Tribe of Gur.
